snippet: SHOULSON--Bertha Eva. The Officers, Directors and Employees of Parkside Memorial Chapels mourn the untimely passing of the devoted mother of our employee Rabbi Jay Shoulson. We pray that the soul of Bertha Shoulson be bound up in the bonds of Eternal Life and that the family be comforted amongst the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Edward S. Goldstein, President; David E. Goldstein, Executive Vice President; Ruth V. Risani, Vice President 1/3
